docs.title: rest-protobuf
docs.text: Monorepo setup using Gradle composite builds to demonstrate a composite multi project configuration using kotlin multiplatform

docs.title: Tech stack
docs.text: Language Kotlin Swift Build system Gradle Backend ktor Mobile UI Jetpack Compose SwiftUI

docs.title: Setup
docs.text:
1. Make sure to have a KMM setup -> https://github.com/Kotlin/kdoctor
  2. Download Android Studio Hedgehog | 2023.1.1 Canary 11 and IntelliJ IDEA 2023.2 EAP (Community Edition
  3. Setup your Java Env. Current project uses Java 17

docs.title: Run server
docs.text: Go to backend section for instructions on how to run the backend

docs.title: Android app
docs.text: Make sure you run it in a simulator only as the server is running locally. Android emulator uses: "http://10.0.2.2:8080/"

docs.title: iOS app
docs.text: Make sure you run it in a simulator only as the server is running locally. iOS simulator uses: "http://localhost:8080/"
